qas.question: What was Kanye arrested for in 2008?
How much was Kanye's bail bond?
What was Kanye finally charged with?

answers.text: one count of misdemeanor vandalism, one count of grand theft and one count of battery

qas.question: On what day was Kanye West arrested at the Los Angeles International Airport?
What were the charges filed against Kanye West?
What was the name of the bodyguard also accused of vandalism?
What was the dollar amount of Kanye's bond?

context: On <a3_0>September 11, 2008<a3_0/>, West and his road manager/bodyguard <a5_0>Don "Don C." Crowley<a5_0/> were arrested at Los Angeles International Airport and booked on charges of <a0_0><a4_0>felony vandalism<a4_0/><a0_0/> after an altercation with the paparazzi in which West and Crowley broke the photographers' cameras. West was later released from the Los Angeles Police Department's Pacific Division station in Culver City on <a1_0><a6_0>$20,000<a6_0/><a1_0/> bail bond. On September 26, 2008, the Los Angeles County District Attorney's Office said it would not file felony counts against West over the incident. Instead the case file was forwarded to the city attorney's office, which charged West with <a2_0>one count of misdemeanor vandalism, one count of grand theft and one count of battery<a2_0/> and his manager with three counts of each on March 18, 2009. West's and Crowley's arraignment was delayed from an original date of April 14, 2009.
